features: ORGANIC - Quality should never be a compromise. MoonPads is committed to providing healthy, non-toxic, organic pads. The average menstruator may spend up to 40,500 hours wearing pads over their lifetime, ingredients in conventional pads have been linked to cancer and other health issues. That is why MoonPads uses 100% organic cotton and plant-plastic. We do not use chemicals or fragrances that compromise our health.

100% BIODEGRADABLE - Planet over Profit. There are 1.8 billion menstruators in the world who have had very few options but to filling landfills (and waterways) with billions of tampons and pads each year. MoonPads is here to offer a better solution. Our pads will biodegrade over the course of one year, compared with conventional plastic pads which will take up to a thousand years to break down.

BUY ONE & GIVE ONE - At MoonPads, we put people and planet over profit. MoonPads is the only pad company, that invests 100% of profit back into eradicating period poverty. With each box sold, we offer a free box of pads to someone in need. We have distributed over 60,000 free pads in the last 2 years.

MoonPads does business differently. We are a multi-national, femme owned and operated social benefit business that sprouted up from a non-profit that addresses the intersectional issues of environmental sustainability, equity, and wellness. Our programs in Tibet dive into maternal child health, intimate partner violence and sexual wellness. We began by sharing education and pads to nomadic menstruators and girls who faced not only period stigma, but also zero access to supplies and healthcare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These tampons came in a cute little box, so it was very easy to store in my purse when i was running errands. This was my first time trying tampons without an applicator but they were a lot easier to insert than I thought, and very comfortable. I will certainly be buying more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: On the small side. Comfortable. Easy application. Love that it’s all natural.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A refreshing take on tampons.
reviews.reviewText: Upon opening this package, I was shocked, I thought surely this must be a joke, the package was SO SMALL.However, upon opening it I see that it's basically normal tampon heads with all the wasteful plastic and applicators removed.Using it is easy and comfortable, you insert it with your finger, which might be a bit different but... it doesn't make these any more difficult to use.The only issue I have is that these are advertised as normal tampons, but I would say these are for light flow, unless you don't mind leaking...I do love that these are less wasteful than regular tampons where more than half of the product (wrapper and applicator) is put directly into the trash immediately. The lack of applicator and oversized wrapper also means that these fit into even the smallest of bags, I can even fit one in my wallet!I also appreciate that for every box purchased, a box is donated to a woman in need, making me feel great about using the product and much more likely to purchase these in the future.All in all these are an excellent buy as long as you don't have a very heavy flow. 4/5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These arrived quickly and well packaged but my mouth hit the floor when I seen the box was so tiny it could fit in my hand. I opened it to find these bullet shaped tightly wrapped tampons that require manual insertion. Now I’m all for environmental friendly and clean products but without an applicator, this is not something that I will choose to use. They are difficult to insert and I find them rather uncomfortable as I don’t feel I am able to get them placed well without an applicator. These do absorb well for light to medium flow and the string does seem to be effective when pulling it out. Due to the hands on experience, you will need to wash your hands before and after insertion and you will likely have some semblance of a mess which I prefer to avoid. The price is on par with similar products but I really feel that they should include at least 1 reusable applicator to make these a viable option for those who prefer one. Overall, as it is I am not a fan of this product but if they were to make some adjustments and include an applicator then this would be a good organic option. Wouldn’t recommend to those who need or prefer an applicator to insert.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 15 year old loves these
reviews.reviewText: I was kind of shocked my 15 year old likes these. She ran out of tampons and didn’t tell me until this was all we had. She loves how small and portable they are. She doesn’t like to carry a purse and these actually fit in the lanyard wallet/coin purse she carries. She really likes how small these are. She also wears long nails so I was worried but she didn’t have any problems using these. Since she’s used to an applicator, I did have to tell her that she needs to wash her hands well and get under her nails before inserting the tampons. These are so easy to store and carry in a smaller size. She hasn’t had any leaks and I like that they’re clean and eco-friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Of course I wanted to love these because I love natural and organic products but these felt like straight up fiberglass and I was immediately sure I would never try again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They work, but not my favorite
reviews.reviewText: These tampons are applicator-free. I get the desire to reduce plastic in the land fills, I really do. But I also really dislike using tampons without applicators. When my flow is heavy, it’s HEAVY, and the amount of mess involved is just not acceptable to me on those days. So I use these on less-heavy days, and they’re ok. They start out really tiny and expand once you’ve put them in, so they’re effective from that standpoint. In fact, that compact size is one thing I do like, as they’re really easy to slip in a pocket or purse. And at least they’re better than those silicone menstrual cups—I tried one, and it was a horrible, messy nightmare. But, honestly, I probably won’t get these again. Even a cardboard applicator is better than none at all, in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tiny but they could be good for a tween or teen
reviews.reviewText: Like others, I was shocked at how small this box is. The tampons are like OB tampons that are applicator free. I do appreciate that there's less waste. I love that they're organic cotton.I think these would be best for a tween or teen and probably lighter flow days.I hope this review helps and that you have a wonderful day!
